name: Sangonomiya Shrine
title: The Pearlescent Palace
desc: "Sangonomiya was once an ocean abyss, until the Great Serpent came, forming a vortex with its spiral movements, and fashioning the coral into an island."

skills.desc: End Phase: Heal all your characters for 1 HP.Usage(s): 2
